title: A Valiant Prince
description: Some princes are born into royalty. And some princes are made into royalty.Logan Winters just discovered that heâ€™s a prince, a prince that someone wants dead.When Princess Susanna came waltzing into his world, she took his breath away with her beauty and charm and also with the truth about his life.Now they are racing against time to find out who wants to kill him.Will they be able to stop a killer? Or will their discovery bring down not one throne but two?
author: S.E. Rose
